search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Leadinfo (leadinfo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Leadinfo is: [https://www.leadinfo.com/pricing/](https://www.leadinfo.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Maximum impact for every budget
-------------------------------

Ideal for small businesses or startups wanting to identify key visitors without advanced features.

**Includes:**

*   Real-time visitor identification

Perfect for companies looking to significantly improve their lead generation with automation and deeper insights.

**Everything in Starter, plus:**

*   GA4 & Looker Studio Integration

Pro

€

359

/mo

Identified companies

[Start free trial](https://portal.leadinfo.com/registration)

For larger teams needing advanced automation, data management, and personalized support.

**Everything in Scale, plus:**

*   Matomo Integration
*   Salesforce & Marketo Integration
*   Unlimited users & automations
*   Mobile phone numbers
*   Visualize user behavior with Screen Recordings (14-day data retention)
*   Unlimited Imports of customer data to automatically assign tags
*   Dedicated Customer Success Manager
*   Personalized onboarding & Quarterly check-ins with CSM

[Download Full Packaging overview](https://www.leadinfo.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/Leadinfo_PricingPackages_EN_v11.pdf)

How does our pricing work?

*   **Start Your Free 14-Day Trial**: Sign up at no cost to discover how many companies Leadinfo can identify on your website.
*   **See Real Results**: During your trial, you’ll get a clear count of identified companies—typically around 30% of your total traffic.
*   **Personalized Offer**: Based on your trial data, we’ll send you a tailored offer so you can choose the package that best fits your needs.

![Image 5](https://www.leadinfo.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Intent-3-1024x751.png)

Fair Pricing Principle

We focus on meaningful traffic by excluding non-relevant visits, such as those from Internet Service Providers (ISPs) and other irrelevant sources.

Additionally, repeat visits from the same company are counted only once, ensuring an accurate view of unique company engagement. Below is the complete pricing list.

![Image 6](https://www.leadinfo.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/li-identified-companies-1024x555.png)

€

39

/mo

Increase conversions by helping visitors quickly. Within 10 seconds, they can request quotes, contact you directly via WhatsApp, and easily book appointments.

### Screen recording

Included from **Scale** package

Discover valuable insights into visitor behavior on your website with our screen recording feature, making it easy to rewatch and analyze user interactions.

### Liquid content

Starting at

€

39

/mo

Dynamically adapt your website to user preferences and behaviour for a personalized and engaging experience that evolves in real-time.

### Expand your reach beyond visitor identification

Leadinfo Autopilot is the perfect complement to identifying website visitors. It’s precise, effective, and engaging.  Here’s what you can do:

*   Send automated LinkedIn requests
*   Communicate easily via email
*   Add DMUs matching your persona

![Image 7](https://www.leadinfo.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Autopilot-ENG.svg)

We're here to answer all your questions
---------------------------------------

![Image 8](https://www.leadinfo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/FAQ-957x1024.webp)

##### What happens after the free 14-day trial?

The trial is 100% free and you’re not committed to anything. Once the trial ends, you will know the number of identified companies that you can match with our pricing tiers. With it we will find the solution and price that works best for you.

##### Is the use of Leadinfo legal under the GDPR?

Yes, the use of Leadinfo is legal under the GDPR, which was introduced as a European privacy law on 25 May 2018.

Leadinfo matches the IP address of the visitor against a publicly available database of company data (such as the Chamber of Commerce). According to the GDPR, the IP address is considered to be private data, and there must be solid justification for its use. The justification is ‘own legitimate interest’, provided for in Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR. This article states working with personal data is permitted if this serves a clear interest and privacy standards are maintained.

Marketing and analytics are considered to be legitimate interests, and Leadinfo only uses private data in a limited capacity. IP addresses are not saved and only publicly accessible corporate data is shared with the users. This means that Leadinfo maintains privacy standards. As a Leadinfo user, you are obliged to state these facts in your company’s privacy statement, as well as the register of data processing operations.

##### Am I committed to anything if I start the 14-day trial period?

No, the 14-day trial is completely free and non-binding. After the trial, you can decide whether you want to subscribe.

##### What if I don’t know how many companies I need to identify?

No worries! If you’re unsure about the number of companies to identify, you can always start with a lower limit and upgrade later as you want to collect more leads. Our support team is happy to help you choose the right plan based on your website traffic and goals. This way, you only pay for what you actually need!

##### Can I adjust my subscription?

Yes, you can easily upgrade or downgrade your subscription to match the needs of your business. Whether you want to upgrade to a larger plan or downgrade, you can easily adjust your plan to match your business needs.

##### What happens if I exceed my lead limit?

If you reach your lead limit, Leadinfo will continue collecting leads but these will not be visible to you. You can upgrade to a higher plan to continue without limits.

##### How do I install the Leadinfo tracking code on my website?

You can install the tracking code by adding the code manually to your website, use Google Tag Manager or use our plug-ins for WordPress, Joomla!, Shopware, Wix, Squarespace or Drupal.

Implement Leadinfo today
------------------------

And transform anonymous website visitors into customers

   

Sign up for free

*   No payment details required
*   GDPR-compliant
*   Trusted by 15.000+ users

We're here to answer all your questions
---------------------------------------

![Image 8](https://www.leadinfo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/FAQ-957x1024.webp)

##### What happens after the free 14-day trial?

The trial is 100% free and you’re not committed to anything. Once the trial ends, you will know the number of identified companies that you can match with our pricing tiers. With it we will find the solution and price that works best for you.

##### Is the use of Leadinfo legal under the GDPR?

Yes, the use of Leadinfo is legal under the GDPR, which was introduced as a European privacy law on 25 May 2018.

Leadinfo matches the IP address of the visitor against a publicly available database of company data (such as the Chamber of Commerce). According to the GDPR, the IP address is considered to be private data, and there must be solid justification for its use. The justification is ‘own legitimate interest’, provided for in Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR. This article states working with personal data is permitted if this serves a clear interest and privacy standards are maintained.

Marketing and analytics are considered to be legitimate interests, and Leadinfo only uses private data in a limited capacity. IP addresses are not saved and only publicly accessible corporate data is shared with the users. This means that Leadinfo maintains privacy standards. As a Leadinfo user, you are obliged to state these facts in your company’s privacy statement, as well as the register of data processing operations.

##### Am I committed to anything if I start the 14-day trial period?

No, the 14-day trial is completely free and non-binding. After the trial, you can decide whether you want to subscribe.

##### What if I don’t know how many companies I need to identify?

No worries! If you’re unsure about the number of companies to identify, you can always start with a lower limit and upgrade later as you want to collect more leads. Our support team is happy to help you choose the right plan based on your website traffic and goals. This way, you only pay for what you actually need!

##### Can I adjust my subscription?

Yes, you can easily upgrade or downgrade your subscription to match the needs of your business. Whether you want to upgrade to a larger plan or downgrade, you can easily adjust your plan to match your business needs.

##### What happens if I exceed my lead limit?

If you reach your lead limit, Leadinfo will continue collecting leads but these will not be visible to you. You can upgrade to a higher plan to continue without limits.

##### How do I install the Leadinfo tracking code on my website?

You can install the tracking code by adding the code manually to your website, use Google Tag Manager or use our plug-ins for WordPress, Joomla!, Shopware, Wix, Squarespace or Drupal.
